A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Anyone that has any appreciation for the true\, legendary Star Wars franchise will watch this and be severely let down. Disney has taken this new-era and made it exactly that. It doesn't try to appeal to the generations that grew up on the classic Star Wars; it's one purpose is to appeal to children. That's it. That's why the story line sucks\, that's why there's no meaningful character development\, that's why Rey become's a \"Jedi\" overnight\, that's why there's no backstory for any of the characters\, that's why there's an out-of-place love story between two useless characters\, that's why there are new\, cute looking animals in every other scene\, that's why there are no actual light-saber fights\, & that's why there's a cheesy joke cracked every other scene. This is no longer the Star Wars that we know and love. It is a low effort script with a ton of CGI made to sell folders and backpacks with Star Wars print on them to elementary school kids. It's not about the story anymore\, its about Disney making money.
